planet.name: Kepler-56 b
KOI 1241.02
KID 8150320
planet.description: This planet candidate was discovered by the Kepler spacecraft. It transits its host star every 10.50 days for 13.5401 hours. Periodic transit timing variations confirm its planetary nature.
